title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: White House strikes deals for lower prices on obesity drugs
items.description: Medicare beneficiaries will soon be able to get obesity and Type 2 diabetes drugs for a $50 copay. But there are some limitations.

items.title: UPS plane crashes near Louisville airport, killing 12; black boxes found
items.description: The number of fatalities may increase after a UPS plane crashed Tuesday near the Louisville International Airport in Kentucky, Gov. Andy Beshear said.

items.title: Judge orders Trump administration to fully fund SNAP benefits for November
items.description: U.S. District Judge John McConnell ordered the Trump administration to provide the full food stamp benefits by Friday.

items.title: Federal judge orders Trump administration to fully fund SNAP benefits in November
items.description: A federal judge in Rhode Island has ordered the Trump administration to find the money to fully fund SNAP benefits for November.

items.title: Damon Jones pleads not guilty in alleged gambling scheme cases
items.description: Former NBA player and coach Damon Jones entered not guilty pleas Thursday in a pair of cases alleging his involvement in illegal gambling rings.

items.title: Busiest US airports face flight reductions because of government shutdown
items.description: Flight capacity will be cut at major airports as air traffic controllers report issues with fatigue amid staff shortages.

items.title: Nancy Pelosi announces retirement after decades in US Congress
items.description: Pelosi made history as the first female Speaker and left an indelible mark on US politics.

items.title: Russian soldier sentenced to life in jail in unprecedented Ukrainian trial
items.description: In the first ruling of its kind, Dmitry Kurashov was found guilty of killing an unarmed Ukrainian soldier who had surrendered.

items.title: COP30: World leaders take aim at Trump for climate inaction
items.description: World leaders address COP30 climate summit in Belém and take aim at Trump record on climate change.
